Title: AN ACT TO AMEND COMMONWEALTH ACT NUMBERED TWO HUNDRED FORTY, AS AMENDED BY COMMONWEALTH ACT NUMBERED THREE HUNDRED TWENTY-NINE.
Data:
[ Commonwealth Act No. 405, September 13, 1938 ]
AN ACT TO AMEND COMMONWEALTH ACT NUMBERED TWO HUNDRED FORTY, AS AMENDED BY COMMONWEALTH ACT NUMBERED THREE HUNDRED TWENTY-NINE.
Be it enacted by the National Assembly of the Philippines:
Section 1. The following items under section one, paragraph A, of Commonwealth Act Numbered Two hundred forty, as amended, are further amended so as to read as follows:

"14. For the Maninila barrio school, Camalig
3,000.00

2,000.00

1,000.00

1,000.00

1,000.00

1,000.00

1,000.00

"SORSOGON

"14. For the Rizal barrio school, Gubat
2,000.00"


Section 2. This Act shall take effect upon its approval.
Approved, September 13, 1938, with the exception of the following items: Ilocos Sur, Item No. 83, Mountain Province, Item No. 1.
